title: US-BSL-4020 shrink tunnel machine, tunnel size 1200 x 400 x 200 mm
title_uz: US-BSL-4020 termo tunnel uskunasi, tunel o'lchami 1200 x 400 x 200 mm
title_ru: Термоусадочная туннельная машина US-BSL-4020, размер туннеля 1200 x 400 x 200
title_en: US-BSL-4020 shrink tunnel machine, tunnel size 1200 x 400 x 200 mm
short_description: This US-BSL-4020 model shrink tunnel machine is a modern equipment designed to wrap shrink films around various products or packages and boxes, improve the appearance of products, increase their aesthetics and value, and produce, it is an ideal choice for businesses  looking to increase their production efficiency and reduce costs. This machine is designed to shrink wrap products quickly and efficiently, with a tunnel size of 1200 x 400 x 200 mm and a conveying speed of 0 - 15 m / min. It is powered by a 220 - 380 V / 50 - 60 Hz power supply and has a power rating of 10 KW. The equipment can also carry loads of up to 15 kg. This equipment is designed to provide high-quality packaging in various materials, including PVC / POF films. The equipment has a compact design with dimensions of 1600 x 600 x 1220 mm and a weight of 110 kg.
short_description_uz: Ushbu US-BSL-4020 modeldagi termo tunnel, termo qadoqlash uskunasi turli xil mahsulotlar yoki paket va qutilar atrofiga qisqaradigan plyonkalarni o'rash, mahsulotlarning ko'rinishini yaxshilash, ularning estetikasi va qiymatini oshirish uchun mo'ljallangan zamonaviy uskuna bo'lib, ishlab chiqarish samaradorligini oshirish va harajatlarni kamaytirishni istagan korxonalar uchun ideal tanlov hisoblanadi. Bu uskunaning tunneli o'lchamlari 1200 x 400 x 200 mm bo'lib, o'ralgan mahsulotlarni daqiqasiga 15 metr tezlikda, samarali ravishda tashib berish imkoniyatiga ega. Uskuna 220 - 380 V / 50 - 60 Hz quvvat manbayi bilan quvvatlanadi va 10 KW quvvat sarflaydi. Uskuna, shuningdek, 15 kggacha yuk tashishi mumkin. Ushbu uskuna turli materiallar, jumladan, PVC / POF plyonkalarida yuqori sifatli qadoqlashni ta'minlash uchun mo'ljallangan. Uskuna o'lchamlari 1600 x 600 x 1220 mm va og'irligi 110 kg bo'lgan ixcham dizaynga ega.
short_description_ru: Эта термоусадочная туннельная машина модели US-BSL-4020 представляет собой современное оборудование, предназначенное для обертывания термоусадочной пленкой различных продуктов или упаковок и коробок, улучшения внешнего вида продуктов, повышения их эстетики и ценности, а также производства. Это идеальный выбор для предприятий, которые ищут повысить эффективность производства и снизить себестоимость. Эта машина предназначена для быстрой и эффективной усадки оберточной продукции с размером туннеля 1200 x 400 x 200 мм и скоростью подачи 0 - 15 м / мин. Он питается от источника питания 220 - 380 В / 50 - 60 Гц и имеет номинальную мощность 10 кВт. Оборудование также может перевозить грузы до 15 кг. Данное оборудование предназначено для обеспечения качественной упаковки в различные материалы, в том числе в пленки ПВХ / ПОФ. Оборудование имеет компактную конструкцию с размерами 1600 х 600 х 1220 мм и массой 110 кг.

This machine is designed to shrink wrap products quickly and efficiently, with a tunnel size of 1200 x 400 x 200 mm and a conveying speed of 0 - 15 m / min. It is powered by a 220 - 380 V / 50 - 60 Hz power supply and has a power rating of 10 KW. The equipment can also carry loads of up to 15 kg. This equipment is designed to provide high-quality packaging in various materials, including PVC / POF films. The equipment has a compact design with dimensions of 1600 x 600 x 1220 mm and a weight of 110 kg.
long_description:
This US-BSL-4020 model shrink tunnel machine is a modern equipment designed to wrap shrink films around various products or packages and boxes, improve the appearance of products, increase their aesthetics and value, and produce, it is an ideal choice for businesses  looking to increase their production efficiency and reduce costs. This machine is designed to shrink wrap products quickly and efficiently, with a tunnel size of 1200 x 400 x 200 mm and a conveying speed of 0 - 15 m / min. It is powered by a 220 - 380 V / 50 - 60 Hz power supply and has a power rating of 10 KW. The equipment can also carry loads of up to 15 kg. This equipment is designed to provide high-quality packaging in various materials, including PVC / POF films. The equipment has a compact design with dimensions of 1600 x 600 x 1220 mm and a weight of 110 kg.

 

 TECHNICAL PARAMETERS OF THE EQUIPMENTS 
 1.   Model  US-BSL-4020    US-BSL-4525   US-BSL-5030  
 2.   Voltage   220 - 380 V / 50 - 60 Hz  220 - 380 V / 50 - 60 Hz  220 - 380 V / 50 - 60 Hz
 3.   Power   10 Kw  13 Kw  15 Kw
 4.   Tunnel size   1200 x 400 x 200 mm   1200 x 450 x 250 mm   1200 x 500 x 300 mm 
 5.   Conveying speed   0 - 15 m / min  0 - 15 m / min   0 - 15 m / min 
 6.   Transport load   15 kg   25 kg   25 kg 
 7.   Applicable film   PVC / POF   PVC / POF   PVC / POF 
 8.   Outside packaging dimensions   1690 x 690 x 800 mm   1690 x 740 x 850 mm   1690 x 790 x 900 mm 
 9.   Machine dimensions    1600 x 600 x 1220 mm  1600 x 650 x 1270 mm   1600 x 700 x 1320 mm 
 10.   Weight   110 kg  140 kg  160 kg

Это идеальный выбор для предприятий, которые ищут повысить эффективность производства и снизить себестоимость. Эта машина предназначена для быстрой и эффективной усадки оберточной продукции с размером туннеля 1200 x 400 x 200 мм и скоростью подачи 0 - 15 м / мин. Он питается от источника питания 220 - 380 В / 50 - 60 Гц и имеет номинальную мощность 10 кВт. Оборудование также может перевозить грузы до 15 кг. This US-BSL-4020 model shrink tunnel machine is a modern equipment designed to wrap shrink films around various products or packages and boxes, improve the appearance of products, increase their aesthetics and value, and produce, it is an ideal choice for businesses  looking to increase their production efficiency and reduce costs. This machine is designed to shrink wrap products quickly and efficiently, with a tunnel size of 1200 x 400 x 200 mm and a conveying speed of 0 - 15 m / min. It is powered by a 220 - 380 V / 50 - 60 Hz power supply and has a power rating of 10 KW. The equipment can also carry loads of up to 15 kg. This equipment is designed to provide high-quality packaging in various materials, including PVC / POF films. The equipment has a compact design with dimensions of 1600 x 600 x 1220 mm and a weight of 110 kg.
